channel.title: My source so far... (United)
channel.description:
Hi,when i got the source it was realy blank so i had to start from scratch to perfect. Here are some features i fixed.
Added woodcutting Added smelting handlers Added mining,now when you mine the rock you have to wait 5 sec to mine again. Added special attacks,only dragon long and dragon dagger.The dragon long needs more upgrades. Added working range and working mage including ancient magics and projectiles and teleporting.You will need runes and arrows do these things.I also added alching,i am trying to fix low alch.I already fixed the high alching system. Added some npc not many at all.I most of the time edit things in client.java I added a little bit of pking. Here are some pictures for you. [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/zx0abs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/50lsm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2f06qty.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2py2jo7.jpg[/img]
~MoparUnited~

Hi,when i got the source it was realy blank so i had to start from scratch to perfect.
Here are some features i fixed.

Added woodcutting
Added smelting handlers
Added mining,now when you mine the rock you have to wait 5 sec to mine again.
Added special attacks,only dragon long and dragon dagger.The dragon long needs more upgrades.
Added working range and working mage including ancient magics and projectiles and teleporting.You will need runes and arrows do these things.I also added alching,i am trying to fix low alch.I already fixed the high alching system.
Added some npc not many at all.I most of the time edit things in client.java
I added a little bit of pking.
